meanings.definition: The quality or state of being outrageous.
meanings.sent1: Her outrageousness in wearing a bright pink tutu to the formal event turned heads.
meanings.sent2: The outrageousness of his behavior at the party shocked everyone.
meanings.sent3: Despite the outrageousness of the situation, she couldn't help but laugh.
meanings.sent4: The outrageousness of the storm's fury was unmatched by anything they had seen before.
meanings.sent5: The outrageousness of the lion's roar echoed through the entire jungle.

meanings.definition: An act or instance of being outrageous.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's outrageousness on stage had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent2: The outrageousness of his prank caused quite a stir among his friends.
meanings.sent3: His outrageousness in trying to juggle flaming torches was both impressive and terrifying.
meanings.sent4: The outrageousness of her dance moves made everyone at the party stop and stare.
meanings.sent5: The outrageousness of the car chase scene in the movie left viewers on the edge of their seats.
